sentences.sentence: This cycle scheme utilizes the hydrogenate of metal for solving the problems of reserving and carrying of hydrogen.
sentences.translation: 本循环方案利用金属氢化物来解决氢的储存和携带问题。

sentences.sentence: Supports a healthy blood stream that will nourish, purify, strengthen, oxygenate and hydrogenate every cell in your body.
sentences.translation: 支持健康的血液流，将滋养，净化，加强，氧气和加氢你的身体每一个细胞。

sentences.sentence: A method for recovering nickel in hydrogenate used catalyst of hydrogen peroxide in nickel sulfate form has been developed.
sentences.translation: 研究了从双氧水氢化废镍催化剂中以硫酸镍形式回收镍的工艺方法。
